name: Pill Bug's World
description:
Entering the Godot Wild Jam #23!!

I entered a little late, started Friday afternoon, finished Sunday Afternoon.

Nice and simple concept and lots of fun.  LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys control Pill Bug and SPACE jumps.  Collect and leaves on the sides of the grassy dip, left, right, sort of like a skateboard half pipe.  Watch out for Pill Bug's arch enemy, the frog who shifts slightly each time you eat a leaf.
